data.name: Algorithmic-Trading
data.description: Momentum or Directional Trading, Capital Asset Pricing model, Multi-Factor model and Portfolio Construction

data.name: Time-Series
data.description: Time series analysis where I show how to manage time series in R, forecasting models (i.e. ARMA, GARCH, DCC), accuracy evaluation, and volatility forecasting.

data.name: Derivative-Pricing
data.description: The code is partly based on Dr. Param Jeet's and Prashan Vats' book 'Learning Quantitative Finance with R'. I recommend it for those interested on learning more complex coding skills related to Quantitative Finance. [In progress.]
